CONFIG_SCHEMA.docs:
Specify the model of the connected controller. Choose one of the config values listed in the table of supported models above.Supported models:
  * **``deltasol_bs_plus``**: `relay1`,  `relay2`, `sensor1_error`, `sensor2_error`, `sensor3_error`, `sensor4_error`, `collector_max`, `collector_min`, `collector_frost`, `tube_collector`, `recooling`, `hqm`.
  
  * **``deltasol_bs_2009``**: `sensor1_error`, `sensor2_error`, `sensor3_error`, `sensor4_error`, `frost_protection_active`.
  
  * **``deltasol_c``**: `sensor1_error`, `sensor2_error`, `sensor3_error`, `sensor4_error`.
  
  * **``deltasol_cs2``**: `sensor1_error`, `sensor2_error`, `sensor3_error`, `sensor4_error`.
  
  * **``deltasol_cs_plus``**: `sensor1_error`, `sensor2_error`, `sensor3_error`, `sensor4_error`.
  
  * **``custom``**: See below.
  
  

*See also: [vbus Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/vbus.html#binary-sensor)*

binary_sensors.docs:
A list of [Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/binary_sensor/index.html#config-binary-sensor) definitions that include a `lambda` to do the decoding and return a `bool` value.

*See also: [custom VBus binary sensors](https://esphome.io/components/vbus.html#custom-vbus-binary-sensors)*

command.docs:
The `command` corresponding to your device (see below).

*See also: [custom VBus binary sensors](https://esphome.io/components/vbus.html#custom-vbus-binary-sensors)*

dest.docs:
The `DFA` value corresponding to your device (see below).

*See also: [custom VBus binary sensors](https://esphome.io/components/vbus.html#custom-vbus-binary-sensors)*

lambda.docs:
**, [lambda](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-lambda)**: Code to parse a value from the incoming data packets and return it. The data packet is in a `std::vector<uint8_t>` called `x`.

*See also: [custom VBus binary sensors](https://esphome.io/components/vbus.html#custom-vbus-binary-sensors)*

source.docs:
The address corresponding to `your device model` (see below).

*See also: [custom VBus binary sensors](https://esphome.io/components/vbus.html#custom-vbus-binary-sensors)*

CONFIG_SCHEMA.docs:
Specify the model of the connected controller. Choose one of the config values listed in the table of supported models above.

*See also: [vbus Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/vbus.html#sensor)*

command.docs:
The `command` corresponding to your device (see below).

*See also: [custom VBus sensors](https://esphome.io/components/vbus.html#custom-vbus-sensors)*

dest.docs:
The `DFA` value corresponding to your device (see below).

*See also: [custom VBus sensors](https://esphome.io/components/vbus.html#custom-vbus-sensors)*

lambda.docs:
**, [lambda](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-lambda)**: Code to parse a value from the incoming data packets and return it. The data packet is in a `std::vector<uint8_t>` called `x`.

*See also: [custom VBus sensors](https://esphome.io/components/vbus.html#custom-vbus-sensors)*

sensors.docs:
A list of [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor) definitions that include a `lambda` to do the decoding and return a `float` value.

*See also: [custom VBus sensors](https://esphome.io/components/vbus.html#custom-vbus-sensors)*

source.docs:
The address corresponding to `your device model` (see below).

*See also: [custom VBus sensors](https://esphome.io/components/vbus.html#custom-vbus-sensors)*
